amendment.description: At the end of division E (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to enter into contracts in fiscal year 2018 with privatized immigration detention facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of privatized immigration detention facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 230 (Roll no. 465).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 230 (Roll no. 465).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
